review: I love this product. The only thing that keeps me from giving it 5 stars is that with Prime I thought there would be more free programs. It's very easy to install and the quality of the picture and sound is great. I started binge watching Downton Abbey and was really into it but they wanted me to purchase season 5 for $20 so I'm planning to check into Netflix or Hulu to see if they have better rates.
author: Steph

review: This works very well.  I was impressed by how quick it connects and responds to my requests.  Best of all, it doesn't break the bank.  My only wish would be for Apple content but that will probably never happen.

review: The stick is working well only when very close to your wireless router. A bit further away where the roku or the fire TV box are function normally, the stick randomly lost wireless signal therefore unreliable. I wanted to equip my entire house with the fire stick but can't because of this issue.
